name: tierodactyl
description: a core application for managing servers on a pterodactyl panel, as well as a pterodactyl panel addon to seamlessly integrate.

scripts.first-run: npm i dotenv dotenv-cli -g; dotenv npm install --save-dev
scripts.deep-clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json && rm -rf dist

author: @zudsniper
